title: Ripple Debunks Five Common Blockchain and Cryptocurrency Myths

title: Celsius to convert its altcoins to bitcoin and ether
description: Bankrupt crypto lender Celsius Network has been granted permission to convert its altcoin holdings into bitcoin (BTC) and ethereum (ETH). The move will allow the company to distribute funds to its creditors in the two most widely used cryptocurrencies.  Celsius…
